original_text: Seeing what was to come, he spoke of the resurrection of the Messiah, that he was not abandoned to the realm of the dead, nor did his body see decay.
korean_text: 미리 본 고로 그리스도의 부활을 말하되 그가 음부에 버림이 되지 않고 그의 육신이 썩음을 당하지 아니하시리라 하더니

sentences.original_text: he spoke of resurrection of Messiah
that he was not abandoned to realm of the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽은 자의 세계에 버려지지 않았다는 것

sentences.original_text: nor did his body see decay
